org.apache.commons.math4.geometry

Interface Point<S extends Space>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - Type of the space.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Vector<S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    S1Point, S2Point, Vector1D, Vector2D, Vector3D

    public interface Point<S extends Space>
extends java.io.Serializable
    This interface represents a generic geometrical point.
    Since:
    3.3
    See Also:
    Space, Vector

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distance(Point<S> p)
      Compute the distance between the instance and another point.
      Space getSpace()
      Get the space to which the point belongs.
      boolean isNaN()
      Returns true if any coordinate of this point is NaN; false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • getSpace

        Get the space to which the point belongs.
        Returns:
        containing space

        boolean isNaN()
        Returns true if any coordinate of this point is NaN; false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if any coordinate of this point is NaN; false otherwise

      • distance

        double distance(Point<S> p)
        Compute the distance between the instance and another point.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the distance between the instance and p
